info.task: navigate to last focusable element in modal dialog
info.title: Navigate to the last focusable element in a modal dialog in interaction mode

setupScript.name: openAddDeliveryAddressDialogAndFocusFirstInput
setupScript.description: opens the 'Add Delivery Address' modal dialog, and sets focus on the first input

user: With focus on the first focusable element inside a modal dialog, navigate to the last focusable element in the same dialog.
instructions.raw: With focus on the first focusable element inside a modal dialog, navigate to the last focusable element in the same dialog.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.
